markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primal Aegis](/Feats.aspx?ID=1720) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy. You and allies within 30 feet of you gain resistance equal to your Wisdom modifier to acid, cold, electricity, fire, negative, and positive damage.
name: Primal Aegis
